oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ada Vaughn
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Miss Ada Vaughn, in period dress and fur tippet. Her feather hat is accessorized with decorative jewels [hair combs].

Ada Vaughn was from Franklin, Tennessee. Her last name is spelled "Vaughn" and "Vaughan" in different sources. She married Joseph E. Cliff (also spelled "Cliffe" in different sources) on August 4, 1903.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Vaughn, Ada
